name: WipEout Remaster (Fan made)
description:
Play WipEout again with modern graphics, a fan made with a time trial mode and 3 ships !

It's a personal project I've made in 2 month on my free time with the help of 3 CG who made the ships.

My goal was to reproduce and improve the original game 3C and try to use the actual graphics technologies of Unity Engine (Post processing, HD render pipeline) to have the best render. It's still a prototype, I tried to experiment AI, custom physics and much more... What you see here is the most advanced and functionnal version I've made until this day.
